verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. Blessed<WH835> is every one that feareth<WH3373> Jehovah<WH3068>, That walketh<WH1980> in his ways<WH1870>.
For thou shalt eat<WH398> the labor<WH3018> of thy hands<WH3709>: Happy<WH835> shalt thou be<WH2896>, and it shall be well with thee.

Thy wife<WH802> shall be as a fruitful<WH6509> vine<WH1612>, In the innermost parts<WH3411> of thy house<WH1004>; Thy children<WH1121> like olive<WH2132> plants<WH8363>, Round about<WH5439> thy table<WH7979>.
Behold <WH1397>, thus shall the man be blessed<WH1288> That feareth<WH3373> Jehovah<WH3068>.
Jehovah <WH3068> bless<WH1288> thee out of Zion<WH6726>: And see<WH7200> thou the good<WH2898> of Jerusalem<WH3389> all the days<WH3117> of thy life<WH2416>.
Yea <WH7200>, see thou thy children<WH1121>'s children<WH1121>. Peace<WH7965> be upon Israel<WH3478>.
